      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.phone with parameters of type PhoneOptions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CreatePhoneRequestBuilder CreatePhoneRequestBuilder.withResponseOptions(PhoneOptions options)
      Ensures that after a Phone is created, the creation response is retrieved with the specified phone's options.
